HDG.BC.content: to “is” belongs: the possible, which we expect, fear, hope for: which we only anticipate
HDG.BC.linkedContent: to “is” belongs: the possible, which we expect, fear, hope for: which we only anticipate

HDG.WM.content: anxiety, attunement to the nothing, not fear > “one feels uncanny,” receding of beings as a whole closes in on us, oppresses us > “anxiety makes manifest the nothing”
HDG.WM.linkedContent: anxiety, attunement to the nothing, not fear > “one feels uncanny,” receding of beings as a whole closes in on us, oppresses us > “anxiety makes manifest the nothing”
